title: The Best Weapons In Stranded Deep
description: Survive the terrors of the island with Stranded Deep's best weapons.

title: Elden Ring Player Defeats Godfrey Using 2 Daggers Without Getting Hit Once
description: An Elden Ring player jumps and dodges to an easy victory against Godfrey without taking a single hit and with just a set of daggers.

title: HBO claims The Last of Us enjoyed record audience growth for second episode
description: Viewers were up 22% in “largest jump ever for an HBO original drama series”

title: Midnight Suns mod adds the hero we needed, Thomas the Tank Engine
description: Morbius? So last year. Deadpool? Ugh. This new Midnight Suns mod adds the hero we actually want into the Marvel strategy game: Thomas the Tank Engine. Yes, I'm entirely serious, why are you looking at me like that?

title: Crisis Core Tried Too Hard To Set Up FF7
description: Crisis Core exists to set the stage for Final Fantasy 7, and it tells its own story well. Cloud’s presence is dead weight, damaging the experience.

title: The Best Items And Structures To Craft First In Stranded Deep
description: Survival is not guaranteed in Stranded Deep, but crafting these items and structures as soon as possible should help.

title: It’s The Best Time Of Year For This Cozy, Slow Burn Game
description: I’m sure that indie studio Mojiken’s supernatural slice-of-life A Space for the Unbound is the perfect game to play when it’s raining outside. It’s set in a pixel-y, 1990’s Indonesia, where everything is tinged in an evocative seafoam green, flanked by a low, hot sun and pink clouds. It gives you an attractive, dry... Read more...

title: God of War Mod Replaces Kratos With Doom Slayer
description: Having already dispatched the hordes of Hell in his own game, a new mod brings the iconic Doom Slayer to the frozen wastes of God of War’s Midgard.

title: Zelda Fan Recreates the Sword from the Zelda 2 Cover Art
description: One Zelda gamer recreates the intricate sword featured on the cover of Zelda II: The Adventure of Link in a stunning piece of fan art.

title: Based On Your Zodiac Sign, Which Street Fighter Character Are You?
description: Street Fighter has a character for everyone, including one for every Zodiac sign. Which one are you?
